H0.text: Bone fractures are what people with osteoporosis are at increased risk of.

H1.text: Epilepsy is the condition that people with osteoporosis are at increased risk of.

H2.text: Senility is what people with osteoporosis are at increased risk of.

H3.text: Growth spurt is what people with osteoporosis are at increased risk of.

A4.text: Bone fractures from osteoporosis can lead to disability and an increased risk of death after the injury in elderly people.
